page.title: 06Entertainment(Survey)
page.content: In our survey we questioned people concerning the popularity of local sources of entertainment. {Public Houses}were a popular location; 58% of the sample visited their local pub regularly. {Discos and dances}were visited less frequently, although if the dance was held in a local social club or pub, more people felt inclined to attend. Such social clubs in this area include the Liberal club and the Working Mens Club. { Cinemas and theatre}proved to be less popular; only 14% of the random sample visited the theatre regularly, and only 5% were regulars at the cinema - over 33% of the sample prefered never to visit either place. Listening to{music}at home was a popular evenings entertainment for those who prefered not to go out.
